parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name>gr2 </name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds [[playMusic]] event handler. Returns id of the handler or -1 when failed. Just like [[addMissionEventHandler]], music EH is also attached to the mission.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''addMusicEventHandler''' [type, function]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [type, function]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> type: [[String]] - "MusicStart" or "MusicStop"

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> function: [[String]] or [[Code]]. Passed params array:
* 0: [[Description.ext#Music|CfgMusic]] class name
* 1: this event handler id

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - event handler id

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ehID = [[addMusicEventHandler]] ["MusicStart", {[[hint]] [[str]] _this}];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ehID = [[addMusicEventHandler]] ["MusicStop", {[[hint]] [[str]] _this}];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMusicEventHandler]], [[playMusic]], [[removeMusicEventHandler]], [[removeAllMusicEventHandlers]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 4, 2013 - 13:30</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Druid|Druid]]<dd class="note">There are these two types at this time:<br>
'''MusicStart''' - It is triggered when the music is started (command [[playMusic]]). In variable _this is stored class name from [[Description.ext#Music|CfgMusic]].<br>
'''MusicStop''' - It is triggered when the music is ended (command [[playMusic]]). In variable _this is stored class name from [[Description.ext#Music|CfgMusic]].

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl></root>
